# startSpeaking(_:)

**Instance Method**

Speaks the selected text, or all text if no selection.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func startSpeaking(_ sender: Any?)
```

## Parameters

- **sender**: The control sending the message; can be `nil`.

## Speaking text

- **stopSpeaking(_:)**: Stops the speaking of text.
